message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it, which is the highest I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $10,000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm happy to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $10,000, so I'm offering $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
